Server

Class Servant

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • Server.Servant
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, ServantInterface

    public class Servant
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements ServantInterface
    Remote object that implements the remote interface named "ServantInterface" and besides extends the abstract class UnicastObjectRemote, meaning that as soon as an instance of this class is created, the resultant object will be already exported as a remote object. Offers a concrete implementation of all the remote methods defined in the interface, store the collections with all the data of this session,
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Perform a new bid over the indicated offer, if all the data is correct, the offer concerned is updated with a new bid in its history
      void notifyClients()
      Whenever a change occurs in the placedOffers collection, every object (reference) in subscribedClients will be notified by sending them a copy of the updated collection These methods work as the Callback of this application

    • Method Detail

      • attach

        public void attach(java.lang.Object observer)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Aggregate a generic object to the list of subscribed clients. The indicated observer must implement the interface Observer, otherwise it will be automatically eliminated as soon as the function notifyClients is called
        Specified by:
        attach in interface ServantInterface
        Parameters:
        observer - a reference to the client that wants to receive updates
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • detach

        public void detach(java.lang.Object observer)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Remove an observer from the list of subscribed clients
        Specified by:
        detach in interface ServantInterface
        Parameters:
        observer - a reference to the client that wants to stop receiving updates
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • notifyClients

        public void notifyClients()
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Whenever a change occurs in the placedOffers collection, every object (reference) in subscribedClients will be notified by sending them a copy of the updated collection These methods work as the Callback of this application
        Specified by:
        notifyClients in interface ServantInterface
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • registerUser

        public boolean registerUser(java.lang.String name,
                            java.lang.String nickname,
                            java.lang.String email,
                            java.lang.String address,
                            java.lang.String phone)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Register a new user with this data, if successful is aggregated to the registeredClients collection
        Specified by:
        registerUser in interface ServantInterface
        Parameters:
        name - real name of the new user [required]
        nickname - nickname of the new user (must be unique) [required]
        email - email address of the new uer [optional]
        address - physical address of the new user [optional]
        phone - phone number of the new user [optional]
        Returns:
        true if the user was correctly registered, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • seekUser

        public User seekUser(java.lang.String nickname)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Search for an user with a determined nickname
        Specified by:
        seekUser in interface ServantInterface
        Parameters:
        nickname - the nickname of the user to be searched
        Returns:
        copy of the User object associated with that nickname or null if no user has that nickname
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • addOffer

        public void addOffer(java.lang.String nickname,
                     java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String description,
                     double initialPrice,
                     java.time.LocalDate deadline)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Place a new offer with this data, if successful the offer is added to the placedOffers collection
        Specified by:
        addOffer in interface ServantInterface
        Parameters:
        nickname - nickname of the user who's placing the offer
        name - name of the product to be offered
        description - brief description of the product
        initialPrice - price to be used as lower threshold for the consequent bids
        deadline - date when the auction will be counted as expired or finished
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • newBid

        public void newBid(int offerID,
                   java.lang.String bidder,
                   double bid)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Perform a new bid over the indicated offer, if all the data is correct, the offer concerned is updated with a new bid in its history
        Specified by:
        newBid in interface ServantInterface
        Parameters:
        offerID - ID of the offer that the user wants to bid over
        bidder - nickname of the client who's planting the bid
        bid - amount of money greater than the current highest bid for that offer
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getCurrentOffers

        public java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.Integer,Offer> getCurrentOffers()
                                                              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Provides a copy updated of the placedOffers collection
        Specified by:
        getCurrentOffers in interface ServantInterface
        Returns:
        a copy of the server's collection of all the offers placed so far
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
